author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_wc__unlock, svn_wc__lock, svn_wc__locked): Moved to svn_wc.h as
svn_wc_unlock, svn_wc_lock, and svn_wc_locked, respectively.  Callers changed.
svn_wc__lock, and svn_wc__locked, respectively, and were in libsvn_wc/wc.h.

recursion function call, and call the new lock_dir() function.

(open_root, add_item, open_item): Make an actual returned baton.

author: sussman
msg: * merge.c (svn_wc_merge): svn_path_split apparently returns an empty
string for the parent when the input contains no slashes; in this
case, make sure we pass a real "." to svn_io_run_diff3.
* diff.c (merge_cmd):  start fleshing out the switch statement.

author: kfogel

introduced in revisions 1577 and 1563 to match the prevailing style
